fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
Resolution on Civil Law Rules on Robotics 
EGE Declaration on Genetics  
DG Connect, DG Just, European Parliament, EPRS, STOA on the ethical and legal impact of New technologies: robotics, AI, genetics... on EU citizens and customers. 
 
270 researchers in AI and Robotics gathered in our OPEN LETTER TO THE EC ON AI AND ROBOTICS 
www.robotics-openletter.eu
organisation_name: NANO BIO INFORMATION COGNITIVE TECHNOLOGY WATCH (NBICWATCH)
goals__remit: Lobbying on nano bio information and cognitive technologies. The organisation aims at influencing the EU Institutions and policy makers toward fostering innovation as well as citizens' protection in a common ethical technological framework.
